title: How reliable and safe are essay writing services? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why on earth would you pay someone to write an essay for you instead of learning how to write like a pro yourself? It’s more trouble right now, but for the rest of your career you’ll be able to handle writing tasks efficiently and competently yourself. More important, you’ll be in complete control of the finished product. You’ll organize and present the information the way you want it to be written. Are you really going to outsource professional writing tasks for the rest of your career?

Legally safe? To the extent that they don’t plagiarize the work of others, or that they don’t defame of libel anyone, then, yes, they are legally safe. However, they are not ethical in any way shape or form. So if you are contemplating using an essay writing service, you have to ask yourself how ethical a person are you?
